pstranslate.midnightconfig.title: §bPlasmythic Studios Translator Configuration
pstranslate.midnightconfig.acousticModel: §eThe absolute path of the acoustic model. Please download the acoustic model from VOSK Models
pstranslate.midnightconfig.cacheSize.too: §eThe size of the audio cache. The larger the value, the more memory is occupied, and the more accurate the recognition result is.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.sampleRate.to: §eThe sample rate of the audio. Please confirm if your microphone supports this sample rate.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.autoSend.tool: §eAutomatically send the recognized text to the chat box. If this option is disabled, you need to manually send the recognized message.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.prefix.toolti: §eThe prefix of the recognized text. If the prefix is not empty, the recognized text will be sent to the chat box with the prefix.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.encoding_repa: §eWarning: This option is still in the beta stage.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.srcEncoding.t: §eWarning: This option is still in the beta stage.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.dstEncoding.t: §eWarning: This option is still in the beta stage.
pstranslate.midnightconfig.author: Owner:                                          §l§0§9PrangellPlays
